column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My experiences have always been great from the start. Bavette's takes reservations
column3: like civilized people. Coming from DC where everything is a line or a free-for-all you would think this is some revolutionary idea. And
column5: in my experience. No long waits at the bar or excuses about tables not being ready. Yet on the other side
column7: they're not pushing to turn your table to get the next cover in. I don't know how they manage to do it.
